Subject: Re: Rude Awakening

Firedrill looked up at the new robot, and he crawled over to where
Beachcomber was lying motionless, climbing over him, in a protective way.
"Please, dont hurt them, take me instead" he said trying to hold his body
weight up with one arm. He then looked closer at the robot, his visro
making a whirling noise, it was his aimer zooming in to take a good look at
him, he noticed the Maximal symbol was on this one. "Your, your a Maximal?"
he said between hoarsed breaths, "Please, help my friends" he blurts out
desperately.
